    declare global {
        namespace JSX {
            interface Element {}
            interface ElementAttributesProperty { props: {} }
        }
    }
    declare var React: any;
    
    export class Empty extends React.Component<{}, {}> {
        render() {
            return <div>Hello</div>;
        }
    }
